original_text: He also walked in the way of the house of Ahab and did what was evil in the sight of the Lord, as the house of Ahab had done, for he was son-in-law to the house of Ahab.
korean_text: 아하시야가 아합의 집 길로 행하여 아합의 집과 같이 여호와 보시기에 악을 행하였으니 그는 아합의 집의 사위가 되었음이러라

sentences.original_text: He also walked in the way of the house of Ahab
and did what was evil in the sight of the Lord
as the house of Ahab had done
for he was son-in-law to the house of Ahab
